description: Manuel Deboxer is looking for a muscled twink to share a scene with him. He asked me to audition one of the potential stars, San Bass. Young San has lived in Montreal for 5 years and he has been sending me messages about his love for our very famous pornstar. When the opportunity came, I thought it would be nice to give him a chance to meet his idol, and even more, to get fucked by him. First though, San had to go through an audition with me. The intention of this kind of audition is to make sure that the model is able to perform well in front of a camera. San surprised me by being quite at ease and he responded very well while I was sucking his 8 incher. So, I'll send his video to Manuel and see if he agrees to meet his number one fan...
title: Deboxer's Twink Audition, Scene #01
